snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission filed an enforcement action against Anthony Fields of Lyons, Ill., accusing him of making fraudulent investment offers through social media sites.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission filed an enforcement action against Anthony Fields of Lyons, Ill., accusing him of making fraudulent investment offers through social media sites.
lead_paragraph: LinkedIn is best known as a social networking hub, where people can locate and research just about anyone.

headline.main: Adviser Accused of Using LinkedIn to Promote Bogus Deals
